p.k: Cyborg wants Pain Bot to be his “little buddy” but is the destructive robot too dangerous to be a sidekick? / Robin goes undercover to destroy the Hive...right after he enjoys some of their perks. / BB avoids being "the dumb one" by making the rest of the Titans dumber, which leaves only Silkie to save the day. / Beast Boy invites Tara to the Titan's Valentine's Day dance and she accepts in order to destroy all of the Titans and exact revenge on Beast Boy. / Stuck inside because of bad weather the Titans play rainy day games after Robin convinces them that indoor activites will cheer up the clouds and make the rain stop.
